skins.shipDescription: Hello! Oh... What am I supposed to call you? "Commander"? Got it! My name is Marie Rose. Just call me Marie, okay? I'm counting on your support, Commander!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the favorite servant of Lady Helena Douglas, head of DOATEC. I can clean, do laundry, cook, be a bodyguard, you name it, I can do it!
skins.acquisition: Hello! Oh... What am I supposed to call you? "Commander"? Got it! My name is Marie Rose. Just call me Marie, okay? I'm counting on your support, Commander!
skins.login: Oh hello, Commander! Let's do our best today!
skins.details: Commander, what are we doing next?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Yaaaaawn... I've gotten a bit sleepy...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, do you feel tired? I can give you a massage!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Oh, Commander must be busy... Then I'll go play with Honoka first before coming back to help you! ...Ehh, I can't?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Where do you think you're touching me?!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Geez, please don't treat me like a little kid!

skins.ENClientName: Devilish Servant Against the Splashing Waves
skins.JPClientName: 波しぶきと小魔サ`バント
skins.shipDescription: Hmm, this swimsuit is pretty cute, but isn't it a bit childish? ...In any case, if you like it, then it's all good!
skins.acquisition: Hmm, this swimsuit is pretty cute, but isn't it a bit childish? ...In any case, if you like it, then it's all good!
skins.login: Ehh... This is no fun... Oh, Commander! Heheh~ Won't you come play with me?
skins.details: A photoshoot? That's fine with me! I'd like to take a lot of wonderful pictures! ...But, I'm not going to strike any weird poses, got it?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, you're always heading out to sea, aren't you? I'm a bit jealous... Eh? I'm right, but it's probably different from what I think?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Heheh, I'll always win when it comes to beach volleyball!
skins.secretaryIdle3: The feeling of the waves on my skin is so nice... Commander, you should come and have a dip too!
skins.secretaryTouch: Your hands feel so nice and cool~
